attributes.action: Create a public register of domestic abuse offenders
attributes.additional_details: We currently have Claire’s law, however, a lot of people either think they don’t need to check or the thought doesn’t pop into their head and for some, that’s to late and can have disastrous consequences. A register like this will push offenders faces and names out their more and will * hopefully* prevent domestic violence from happening and deter people from committing these offences.
attributes.background: Create a register like the sex offenders register to make it easier for people to know whether or not they are having a relationship with someone who has been convicted of domestic abuse and all charges relating.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Create a public register of domestic abuse offenders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713569
